谷歌翻译：
声望标志 
Items that are dropped very rarely by most humans, they are effectively mob spawners, so you can populate places, each one spawns a different mob. 大多数人很少被丢弃的物品，他们得到有效的暴徒产卵，这样你就可以填充的地方，每个人都会产生一个不同的暴徒 。 
So, every 10 minutes, they will spawn 5 of the mob that they represent, but configurable. 因此，每隔10分钟，他们将产生5，他们所代表的暴徒，但配置 。 

Hidden Blade 隐藏刀片 
A powerful Assassin's tool, can be obtained whist in either good/bad alignment, If you are Evil, your best bet is attacking a weak Assassin and hoping he drops one, if you are good and in a team with one or more Assassins you can right click one of them with nothing in your hand to receive this powerful item, It has a 1 in 3 chance (just like Assassins themselves) of killing most mobs, it only has 20 uses and is not craftable/repairable. 一个强大的刺客的工具，可无论是好/坏对齐惠斯特，如果你是邪恶的，你最好的赌注是攻击一个弱刺客，并希望他滴之一，如果你是好和您可以与一个或多个刺客团队右键单击在你的手没有收到这个强大的项目其中之一，它有1 3的机会（就像刺客本身）杀死大部分小怪，只使用20次，是不是craftable /可修复。 

Hearts 红桃 
The heart is a special item, because it's actually technically a mob (that is 2d and doesn't move), on contact it will heal you 1 heart, it can be collected when you have full health, also for those who cheat their health amount, it will no longer set it back to 20. 心脏是一个特殊的项目，因为它实际上是在技术上暴徒（2D和不动），接触它会医治你1心脏，它可以被收集，当你有充分的健康，也为那些欺骗他们的健康量，将不再设置回至20日。 

Cheers, 欢呼声，
